data.title: Atomic Boutique online scamming people out of money
data.text: Atomic Boutique gets a lot of positive reviews on its brick and mortar store, but its online shopping site leaves much to be desired. It seems everyone who makes a purchase from their website is only given a tracking via usps but no shipment arrives at the customer's address. I experienced this with atomic boutique the first (and last) time I ever shopped with their online store. They were quite content with not sending me my package until I mentioned contacting my bank's fraud department. That was their only motivation to finally send me my $70 worth of clothing. Needless to say I will be sending this package back, collecting my refund, and taking my business elsewhere. It is also worth mentioning that the only shipping option on the website is the $20 two business day shipping method, which is the reddest flag of all that should let every consumer know that this business is indeed a scam.

data.title: Store has moved
data.text: Nice little shop that's owned by a really sweet couple. It's unfortunately no longer at this location. I'm not sure if they have moved or if they're just operating their online store. Miss you guys! ♡

data.title: DO NOT ORDER ONLINE WITH THIS STORE
data.text: I ordered a dress over a month ago and it has not been shipped yet but I've been charged for the order on my visa.  I have sent several emails and no one is getting back to me with the issue.  It's the worst online shopping experience I've ever had.  The last thing I want to have to do is call visa and try and get my money back.  So disappointed.

data.title: Awesome Retro-Style Shop to Visit
data.text: If retro and Rockabilly is your thing, you must visit this cute store with unique items and clothing.  I am neither of the aforementioned, but I always enjoy popping into this store to see what's new when I am antiquing in the nearby stores.

data.title: Cool spot in a cool area
data.text: Upland needs these guys!  Retro style clothes, shoes & extras for adults and the kiddies.  Orders take a while but they get what u want without changes.  Cool stuff on the racks for guys & girls plus gift ideas and they let u order form their suppliers catalog. Cool rock n roll owners too, only place I get my creeps and hair grease from.  If ur into the retro look u need to get into Atomic!

data.title: Unique and lovely clothes & shoes
data.text: Rockabilly  and 50's era type clothes.  The things you purchase there would be difficult to find other than online.   Betty Page type shoes.   A fun place to browse and buy if you are tired of the every day Kohl's type dresses.
